q1: How popular is the Italian team?
q2: Why do you think the Italian team is unpopular?
a2: Because they play like little girls
q3: Isn't it kind of offensive to say they play like little girls?
a3: It is very offensive, especially because in the last few years the women's teams have played better than the men's teams.
q4: Italy is the toughest team in history
a4: They are not, they didn't make the World Cup.
q5: Did their women's team make it to the world cup then?
a5: women's under-20 world cup and under-17 women's cup both organized by FIFA
